item.description:
Hello, everyone.

Posting this with a little less detail than usual so that people will be able to make plans.

The winner of our "K" restaurant poll is Kagawa in Quincy Center. We will be going there on Wednesday, March 25th at 6:30. Seating in the main dining area is limited here so we are limiting this event to 12 diners, including Guests.

Hope to see you there.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Kagawa Sushi Bar & Restaurant
1554 Hancock St., Quincy
617-773-7280
http://kagawarestaura...
Wednesday, March 25th @ 6:30 PM.



Organizer: Mike

Maximum number of attendees: 12

Guests: One per member. As of March 18th, we are now allowing Members to bring a Guest.

Event Fees: Annual Members - Free, Members and Guests - $2pp

Cash Only Policy: Please bring cash! Paying for all of our meals in cash has been SSDOMG'S policy for over two years. It allows us to avoid the confusion of having the waitstaff run multiple credit card slips and generally helps to keep things simpler for everyone.

RSVP Deadline: Tuesday, March 24th @ 6:00 PM.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions: Kagawa is located on Hancock Street in Quincy Center, just a couple blocks north of our recently visited "J" restaurant, The Jury Room. There is parking along Hancock Street, but much more is available in the municiple parking lot whose entrance is located across from the Quincy Courthouse at 1 Dennis Ryan Parkway.
item.how_to_find_us: Our reservation will be under both 'Mike' and 'South Shore Meetup Group'.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: "K": Kagawa desu ka!
